price: 他说：“你们先抛吧！”当他们抛下去时，他们眩惑了众人的眼睛，而且使人们恐怖。他们施展了大魔术。
arabic: قَالَ أَلۡقُواْۖ فَلَمَّآ أَلۡقَوۡاْ سَحَرُوٓاْ أَعۡيُنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱسۡتَرۡهَبُوهُمۡ وَجَآءُو بِسِحۡرٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qāla alqū falammā alqaw saḥarū aʿyuna al-nāsi wa-is'tarhabūhum wajāū bisiḥ'rin ʿaẓīmin
